commits.message:
Remove `awscli` from production images (#1282)

There is a security vulnerability in `awscli`. I considered ignoring the
vulnerability, but actually a better approach might be for us to just
remove the AWS CLI from the container images, since we don't actually
use it.

The only potential use would be from ad-hoc container sessions we use
for debugging, but we can just reinstall it if we need it in that case.
commits.author: Tom Dooner

commits.message:
FFS-3645: Add "custom_headers" config to PDF API transmitter (#1265)

This got overlooked on the initial implementation but will be necessary:
the capability to add custom headers to the PDF API request (the same as
the JSON request).

For now I'm going to make these share the same "custom_headers" object
in the configuration, since the values happen to be the same for LA, but
in the future we can split them out if necessary.
commits.author: Tom Dooner

commits.message:
Refactor otel_test.go to use testify assertions

Replaces manual error checks in TestOtel_EmitsSpan with testify's require.Len and assert.Equal for improved readability and consistency in test assertions.

commits.message:
Refactor Redis config to use core.Config struct

Moved Redis configuration from environment variables to the core.Config struct, updating StatusRouter and related tests to accept Redis settings from config. Added RedisConfig to core.Config, with helper functions and environment variable support. Improved context handling in status handler and cleaned up middleware comments. Updated circuit breaker tests and added interface assertion for RedisBreaker.
